issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: Clients
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with CLI, Webclient, JDBC clients or other such clients.

fields.description:
sometimes ,when I run  a hive join query , get the following error:

Error: Error while compiling statement: FAILED: SemanticException Generate Map Join Task Error: Encountered unregistered class ID: 95

but,when I try to run it several times,it maybe succeed.
fields.summary: Error: Error while compiling statement: FAILED: SemanticException Generate Map Join Task Error: Encountered unregistered class ID: 95

comments.body: Can you please provide a small reproducible test case? There were several fixes that went in after 0.13.0 related to kryo. We might no longer have this issue in recent releases.
the ERROR can not be reproducible,because when I try to run it，it succeed。and from the log，I can not find the keywords “kryo”. so, I think it maybe some other issue .

there some other logs :
